author: cnbc.com
title: e.l.f. Beauty Announces Earnings Release Date and Conference Call and Webcast
text:
OAKLAND, Calif.--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- e.l.f. Beauty (NYSE: ELF), today announced that the Company will conduct a conference call to discuss its first quarter fiscal 2018 results on Wednesday, May 9, 2018, at 4:30 p.m. Eastern Time. A press release detailing the Company’s first quarter fiscal 2018 results will be issued prior to the call. The conference call will be hosted by Tarang Amin, Chairman and Chief Executive Officer, and John Bailey, President and Chief Financial Officer.
Investors and analysts interested in participating in the call are invited to dial approximately ten minutes prior to the start of the call. The U.S. toll free dial-in for the conference call is (877) 407-3982 and the international dial-in number is (201) 493-6780. The conference call will also be webcast live at: http://investor.elfcosmetics.com/ and remain available for 90 days. A telephone replay of this call will be available at 7:30 p.m. ET on May 9, 2018, until 11:59 p.m. ET on May 16, 2018, and can be accessed by dialing the U.S. toll free dial-in, (844) 512-2921 or the international dial-in, (412) 317-6671, and entering replay pin number 13679040.
About e.l.f. Beauty
e.l.f. makes luxurious beauty accessible for all. Established in 2004 as an e-commerce business ( www.elfcosmetics.com ), e.l.f. has become a true multi-channel brand through its e.l.f. stores and national distribution at Target, Walmart, Ulta Beauty and other leading retailers. By engaging young, diverse makeup enthusiasts with high-quality, prestige-inspired beauty products at extraordinary value, e.l.f. has become one of the fastest growing beauty companies in the United States.
For more information about e.l.f. Beauty, visit the Company’s website at http://www.elfcosmetics.com .
